thread.title: Widower Ray Johnstone reveals his next Sydney fishing spot | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Widower Ray Johnstone reveals his next Sydney fishing spot | Daily Mail Online

author: Cindy Tran For Daily Mail Australia
title: Widower Ray Johnstone reveals his next Sydney fishing spot | Daily Mail Online
text: Reel friends! Lonely Gumtree widower, 75, to go on another fishing trip with his grandson in Sydney after kind strangers raised money Adelaide man Ray Johnstone 75, posted on Gumtree looking for a fishing buddy The pensioner's friend had recently died and he did not want to fish alone He placed an advert on the classifieds website seeking for a new fishing buddy A Brisbane fisherman, 22, answered his ad and took Mr Johnstone on a trip On Thursday, Mr Johnstone revealed on social media about his next adventure Strangers have raised money to fly Mr Johnstone to Sydney for a fishing trip Avid fisherman Joe Forza will take Mr Johnstone fishing around the Harbour Published: 13:01 GMT, 16 February 2017 | Updated: 22:48 GMT, 16 February 2017 547 shares
